AddAuthorityTemplateItems.title: AddAuthorityTemplateItems
AddAuthorityTemplateItems.summary: Adds instances, databases, and tables to the specified permission template.

AddInstance.title: AddInstance
AddInstance.summary: Adds a database instance to Data Management (DMS) and enable security hosting for the instance.

AddLhMembers.title: AddLhMembers
AddLhMembers.summary: Adds a workspace administrator, a workspace member, or a task flow developer in Data Management (DMS).

AddLogicTableRouteConfig.title: AddLogicTableRouteConfig
AddLogicTableRouteConfig.summary: Adds a routing algorithm to a logical table.

AddTableToCategory.title: AddTableToCategory
AddTableToCategory.summary: Add a table to an asset category.

AddTaskFlowEdges.title: AddTaskFlowEdges
AddTaskFlowEdges.summary: Creates directed edges for the existing task nodes of a task flow.

AnalyzeSQLLineage.title: AnalyzeSQLLineage
AnalyzeSQLLineage.summary: Analyzes the lineage (dependencies and influence) between tables and between fields in SQL statements.

AnswerSqlSyntaxByMetaAgent.title: AnswerSqlSyntaxByMetaAgent
AnswerSqlSyntaxByMetaAgent.summary: Answers the syntax questions of the corresponding engine according to the specified database ID.

BackFill.title: BackFill
BackFill.summary: Backfills data for a task flow.

BatchCreateDataLakePartitions.title: BatchCreateDataLakePartitions
BatchCreateDataLakePartitions.summary: Creates multiple partitions for a table in a data lakehouse at a time.

BatchDeleteDataLakePartitions.title: BatchDeleteDataLakePartitions
BatchDeleteDataLakePartitions.summary: Deletes multiple partitions of a table in a data lakehouse at a time.

BatchUpdateDataLakePartitions.title: BatchUpdateDataLakePartitions
BatchUpdateDataLakePartitions.summary: Updates multiple partitions of a table in a data lakehouse at a time.

BuyPayAsYouGoOrder.title: BuyPayAsYouGoOrder
BuyPayAsYouGoOrder.summary: Purchases a pay-as-you-go Data Management (DMS) resource.

ChangeColumnSecLevel.title: ChangeColumnSecLevel
ChangeColumnSecLevel.summary: Adjusts the sensitivity level of fields.

ChangeColumnSecurityLevel.title: ChangeColumnSecurityLevel
ChangeColumnSecurityLevel.summary: Changes the security level of a column.

ChangeLhDagOwner.title: ChangeLhDagOwner
ChangeLhDagOwner.summary: Transfers the ownership of a task flow in a workspace of Data Management (DMS).

ChatWithDesensitize.title: ChatWithDesensitize
ChatWithDesensitize.summary: Chat API with DMS Data Masking capabilities.

ChatWithDesensitizeSSE.title: ChatWithDesensitizeSSE
ChatWithDesensitizeSSE.summary: Chat SSE API with DMS Data Masking capability.

CreateAbacPolicy.title: CreateAbacPolicy
CreateAbacPolicy.summary: Creates a policy to manage the permissions on DMS features and data resources managed in DMS in a fine-grained manner.

CreateDataArchiveOrder.title: CreateDataArchiveOrder
CreateDataArchiveOrder.summary: Creates a data archiving ticket to archive data to destinations such as dedicated storage space or ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances.

CreateDataCorrectOrder.title: CreateDataCorrectOrder
CreateDataCorrectOrder.summary: Creates a ticket for changing data in Data Management (DMS).

CreateDataCronClearOrder.title: CreateDataCronClearOrder
CreateDataCronClearOrder.summary: Creates a ticket for clearing historical data.

CreateDataExportOrder.title: CreateDataExportOrder
CreateDataExportOrder.summary: Creates a ticket to export an SQL result set.

CreateDataImportOrder.title: CreateDataImportOrder
CreateDataImportOrder.summary: Creates a ticket for importing data to Data Management (DMS).

CreateDataLakeDatabase.title: CreateDataLakeDatabase
CreateDataLakeDatabase.summary: Creates a database in a data lakehouse.

CreateDataLakeFunction.title: CreateDataLakeFunction
CreateDataLakeFunction.summary: Creates a custom function in a data lakehouse.

CreateDataLakePartition.title: CreateDataLakePartition
CreateDataLakePartition.summary: Creates a partition for a table in a data lakehouse.

CreateDataLakeTable.title: CreateDataLakeTable
CreateDataLakeTable.summary: Creates a table in a data lakehouse.

CreateLakeHouseSpace.title: CreateLakeHouseSpace
CreateLakeHouseSpace.summary: Creates a workspace for data warehouse development in Data Management (DMS).

CreateLogicDatabase.title: CreateLogicDatabase
CreateLogicDatabase.summary: Creates a logical database in Data Management (DMS).

CreateProxy.title: CreateProxy
CreateProxy.summary: Enables the secure access proxy feature for a database instance.

CreateProxyAccess.title: CreateProxyAccess
CreateProxyAccess.summary: Grants a user the permissions to access a database instance by using the secure access proxy feature.

CreateScenario.title: CreateScenario
CreateScenario.summary: Creates a business scenario to group task flows by business scenario.

CreateTask.title: CreateTask
CreateTask.summary: Creates a task node for a task flow.

CreateUploadFileJob.title: CreateUploadFileJob
CreateUploadFileJob.summary: Creates a task to upload an attachment file.

CreateUploadOSSFileJob.title: CreateUploadOSSFileJob
CreateUploadOSSFileJob.summary: Creates a task to upload an Object Storage Service (OSS) file and obtain the key of the task.

DeleteAbacAuthorization.title: DeleteAbacAuthorization
DeleteAbacAuthorization.summary: Detaches a policy from a user or role.

DeleteDataLakeDatabase.title: DeleteDataLakeDatabase
DeleteDataLakeDatabase.summary: Deletes a database from a data lakehouse.

DeleteDataLakeFunction.title: DeleteDataLakeFunction
DeleteDataLakeFunction.summary: Deletes a user-defined function in a data lakehouse.

DeleteDataLakePartition.title: DeleteDataLakePartition
DeleteDataLakePartition.summary: Deletes a partition from a table in a data lakehouse.

DeleteDataLakeTable.title: DeleteDataLakeTable
DeleteDataLakeTable.summary: Deletes a table from a data lakehouse.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: Removes a database instance from Data Management (DMS).

DeleteLhMembers.title: DeleteLhMembers
DeleteLhMembers.summary: Removes a workspace member or a task flow developer in Data Management (DMS).

DeleteLogicDatabase.title: DeleteLogicDatabase
DeleteLogicDatabase.summary: Deletes a logical database from Data Management (DMS). This operation only deletes the specified logical database but does not delete physical databases.

DeleteLogicTableRouteConfig.title: DeleteLogicTableRouteConfig
DeleteLogicTableRouteConfig.summary: Deletes a routing algorithm from a logical table.

DeleteProxy.title: DeleteProxy
DeleteProxy.summary: You can call this operation to disable the data security protection proxy of a DB instance.

DeleteProxyAccess.title: DeleteProxyAccess
DeleteProxyAccess.summary: Revokes the permissions to access a database instance by using the secure access proxy feature from a user.

DeleteTask.title: DeleteTask
DeleteTask.summary: Deletes a task in a specified task flow.

DeleteTaskFlowEdgesByCondition.title: DeleteTaskFlowEdgesByCondition
DeleteTaskFlowEdgesByCondition.summary: Deletes task flow edges based on multiple conditions.

DeleteUser.title: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.summary: Deletes an Alibaba Cloud account that is no longer used.

DisableUser.title: DisableUser
DisableUser.summary: Disables a user that is temporarily not used in Data Management (DMS).

DownloadDataTrackResult.title: DownloadDataTrackResult
DownloadDataTrackResult.summary: Downloads the parsing result of a data tracking task.

EditLogicDatabase.title: EditLogicDatabase
EditLogicDatabase.summary: Edits the information about a logical database.

EditMetaKnowledgeAsset.title: EditMetaKnowledgeAsset
EditMetaKnowledgeAsset.summary: Edits the metadata business knowledge for specified GUIDs.

EnableUser.title: EnableUser
EnableUser.summary: Enables a user that is disabled.

ExecuteDataCorrect.title: ExecuteDataCorrect
ExecuteDataCorrect.summary: Submits a ticket for data change.

FixSqlByMetaAgent.title: FixSqlByMetaAgent
FixSqlByMetaAgent.summary: Uses the specified SQL statement, error message, and database ID to analyze and fix the SQL error.

GenerateSqlFromNL.title: GenerateSqlFromNL
GenerateSqlFromNL.summary: Automatically retrieves relevant database and business information and generates the executable SQL statement based on the natural language description provided.

GetAbacPolicy.title: GetAbacPolicy
GetAbacPolicy.summary: Queries the details of a policy, including the name, content, and the user who created the policy.

GetApprovalDetail.title: GetApprovalDetail
GetApprovalDetail.summary: Queries the approval details of a ticket.

GetAuthorityTemplate.title: GetAuthorityTemplate
GetAuthorityTemplate.summary: Queries the information about a permission template.

GetAuthorityTemplateItem.title: GetAuthorityTemplateItem
GetAuthorityTemplateItem.summary: Queries the resources in a permission template.

GetClassificationTemplate.title: GetClassificationTemplate

GetDBTaskSQLJobLog.title: GetDBTaskSQLJobLog
GetDBTaskSQLJobLog.summary: Queries the log that records the scheduling details of an SQL task.

GetDBTopology.title: GetDBTopology
GetDBTopology.summary: Queries the topologies of a logical database and its physical database shards.

GetDataArchiveCount.title: GetDataArchiveCount

GetDataArchiveOrderDetail.title: GetDataArchiveOrderDetail
GetDataArchiveOrderDetail.summary: Queries the details of a data archiving ticket, including the time when the ticket was created, the scheduling information of the data archiving task, the logs of the data archiving task, and the database to which data is archived.

GetDataCorrectBackupFiles.title: GetDataCorrectBackupFiles

GetDataCorrectOrderDetail.title: GetDataCorrectOrderDetail

GetDataCorrectTaskDetail.title: GetDataCorrectTaskDetail
GetDataCorrectTaskDetail.summary: Queries the information about a data change, lock-free data change, or data import task.

GetDataCronClearConfig.title: GetDataCronClearConfig

GetDataCronClearTaskDetailList.title: GetDataCronClearTaskDetailList

GetDataImportSQL.title: GetDataImportSQL

GetDataLakeCatalog.title: GetDataLakeCatalog
GetDataLakeCatalog.summary: Queries the data catalog of the data lake.

GetDataLakeDatabase.title: GetDataLakeDatabase
GetDataLakeDatabase.summary: Queries the information about the database in the data lake.

GetDataLakeFunction.title: GetDataLakeFunction
GetDataLakeFunction.summary: Obtains the details about a user-defined function in a data lakehouse.

GetDataLakePartition.title: GetDataLakePartition
GetDataLakePartition.summary: Queries the information about a partition of a table in a data lakehouse.

GetDataLakeTable.title: GetDataLakeTable
GetDataLakeTable.summary: Queries basic information about tables in the data lake.

GetDataTrackJobDegree.title: GetDataTrackJobDegree

GetDataTrackOrderDetail.title: GetDataTrackOrderDetail
GetDataTrackOrderDetail.summary: Queries the details of a data tracking ticket.

GetDatabaseExportOrderDetail.summary: Queries the details of a database export ticket.

GetDbExportDownloadURL.title: GetDbExportDownloadURL
GetDbExportDownloadURL.summary: Queries the download URL of the results of a database export ticket.

GetInstance.summary: Queries the details of a database instance.

GetLhSpaceByName.title: GetLhSpaceByName

GetLogicDatabase.title: GetLogicDatabase
GetLogicDatabase.summary: Queries the details of a logical database.

GetOrderAttachmentFile.title: GetOrderAttachmentFile

GetOrderBaseInfo.title: GetOrderBaseInfo

GetPagedInstance.title: GetPagedInstance

GetPermApplyOrderDetail.title: GetPermApplyOrderDetail

GetRuleNumLimitOfSLA.title: GetRuleNumLimitOfSLA

GetTableDesignProjectInfo.summary: Queries the information about the project and change base database of a schema design ticket, such as the state of the ticket, the ID of the user who created the ticket, and the name and ID of the change base database.

GetTableKnowledgeInfo.summary: Gets metadata knowledge for a specified GUID.

GetTableTopology.title: GetTableTopology
GetTableTopology.summary: Queries the topology of a table.

GetTask.title: GetTask
GetTask.summary: Queries the configurations, including time variables, of a specified task node based on the task node ID.

GetUser.summary: Queries the information about a user.

ListDBTaskSQLJobDetail.summary: Queries the details of an SQL task.

ListDataLakeTable.summary: Queries a list of tables in a data lake.

ListDatabases.summary: Queries the databases in a database instance.

ListInstances.summary: Queries the information about database instances.

ListLhTaskFlowAndScenario.summary: Queries the information about task flows in the business scenarios of a workspace in Data Management (DMS).

ListLogicTableRouteConfig.summary: Queries the routing algorithms of a logical table.

ListProxyAccesses.summary: Queries information about users that are authorized to access a database instance by using the secure access proxy feature.

ListProxySQLExecAuditLog.summary: Queries the audit logs generated by the secure access proxy feature.

ListSLARules.summary: Queries the custom service level agreement (SLA) rules of a task flow.

ListSQLReviewOriginSQL.summary: Queries the details of the SQL statements that are involved in an SQL review ticket.

ListSensitivityLevel.summary: Queries the sensitivity levels of a classification template.

ListTableColumns.title: ListTableColumns
ListTableColumns.summary: Queries the details about fields in a table.

ListTables.title: ListTables
ListTables.summary: Queries the tables in a database.

ListTablesInCategory.summary: Obtains the list of tables in a category.

ListTaskFlow.title: ListTaskFlow
ListTaskFlow.summary: Queries a list of task flows.

ListUserPermissions.title: ListUserPermissions

ModifyDataCorrectExecSQL.summary: Modifies the SQL script that is submitted by using a data change ticket.

ModifyDesensitizationStrategy.title: ModifyDesensitizationStrategy

ModifyInstance.title: ModifyInstance
ModifyInstance.summary: Modifies the basic and advanced information about a database instance in Data Management (DMS). The basic information includes the hosting mode of the instance, the instance account username and password, and features that are enabled for the instance. The advanced information includes the environment type, the instance name in DMS, and the timeout period for querying and exporting data.

MoveTaskFlowToScenario.summary: Migrates a task flow to a specified business scenario.

PauseDataCorrectSQLJob.summary: Pauses a SQL task for data change.

PauseDataExportJob.title: PauseDataExportJob
PauseDataExportJob.summary: Terminates a SQL result set export task.

PreviewWorkflow.title: PreviewWorkflow
PreviewWorkflow.summary: Previews the approval process of a ticket before the ticket is submitted.

PublishAndDeployTaskFlow.title: PublishAndDeployTaskFlow
PublishAndDeployTaskFlow.summary: Publishes and deploys a task flow.

QueryDataTrackResultDownloadStatus.title: QueryDataTrackResultDownloadStatus

ReDeployLhDagVersion.title: ReDeployLhDagVersion
ReDeployLhDagVersion.summary: Redeploys the published versions of a task flow.

RefundPayAsYouGoOrder.title: RefundPayAsYouGoOrder
RefundPayAsYouGoOrder.summary: Unsubscribes from a pay-as-you-go Data Management (DMS) resource.

RegisterInstance.title: RegisterInstance
RegisterInstance.summary: Registers a database instance in Data Management (DMS).

RegisterUser.title: RegisterUser
RegisterUser.summary: Adds a user of your enterprise.

RemoveTableFromCategory.title: RemoveTableFromCategory
RemoveTableFromCategory.summary: Removes table from the asset category.

RestartDataCorrectSQLJob.title: RestartDataCorrectSQLJob
RestartDataCorrectSQLJob.summary: Reruns a failed SQL task for data change.

RestartDataExportJob.title: RestartDataExportJob
RestartDataExportJob.summary: Restarts a SQL result set export task.

ResumeTaskFlowInstance.title: ResumeTaskFlowInstance
ResumeTaskFlowInstance.summary: Resumes a suspended task flow instance.

RetryDataCorrectPreCheck.title: RetryDataCorrectPreCheck
RetryDataCorrectPreCheck.summary: Reruns the precheck for a data change ticket.

RevokeTemplateAuthority.title: RevokeTemplateAuthority
RevokeTemplateAuthority.summary: Revokes permissions on resources from Data Management (DMS) users by using a permission template.

RevokeUserPermission.title: RevokeUserPermission
RevokeUserPermission.summary: Revokes the permissions on instances, databases, and tables from a user.

SearchDataTrackResult.title: SearchDataTrackResult
SearchDataTrackResult.summary: Searches for the parsing result of a data tracking task.

SearchDatabase.title: SearchDatabase
SearchDatabase.summary: Queries the details of the databases.

SetOwners.title: SetOwners
SetOwners.summary: Configures the owner of an instance, a database, or a table.

SetWorkflowExtraInfo.title: SetWorkflowExtraInfo
SetWorkflowExtraInfo.summary: Configures whether the operation buttons, such as Agree, Revoke, and Sign, are displayed in the ticket approval section of the DMS console.

SimplyAddInstance.title: SimplyAddInstance
SimplyAddInstance.summary: This operation is suitable for special scenarios and is not recommended. To register an instance with DMS, we recommend that you call the AddInstance operation first.

SkipDataCorrectRowCheck.title: SkipDataCorrectRowCheck
SkipDataCorrectRowCheck.summary: Skips the verification on the number of rows in the precheck for data change.

SubmitStructSyncOrderApproval.title: SubmitStructSyncOrderApproval
SubmitStructSyncOrderApproval.summary: Submits a schema synchronization ticket for approval.

SuspendDataExportJob.title: SuspendDataExportJob
SuspendDataExportJob.summary: Suspends an ongoing or scheduled SQL result set export task.

SyncDatabaseMeta.title: SyncDatabaseMeta
SyncDatabaseMeta.summary: Synchronizes the metadata of a database.

SyncInstanceMeta.title: SyncInstanceMeta
SyncInstanceMeta.summary: Synchronizes the metadata of all databases in a database instance.

TryRunTaskFlow.title: TryRunTaskFlow
TryRunTaskFlow.summary: Tests the task flow of task orchestration.

UpdateAbacPolicy.title: UpdateAbacPolicy
UpdateAbacPolicy.summary: Updates the name, description, or content of a policy.

UpdateDataLakeDatabase.title: UpdateDataLakeDatabase
UpdateDataLakeDatabase.summary: Updates the information about a database in a data lakehouse.

UpdateDataLakeFunction.title: UpdateDataLakeFunction
UpdateDataLakeFunction.summary: Updates a user-defined function in a data lakehouse.

UpdateDataLakePartition.title: UpdateDataLakePartition

UpdateDataLakeTable.title: UpdateDataLakeTable
UpdateDataLakeTable.summary: Updates the information about a table in a data lakehouse.

UpdateInstance.title: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.summary: Updates the information about a database instance and checks the connectivity of the database instance.

UpdateSLARules.title: UpdateSLARules
UpdateSLARules.summary: Updates the timeout reminder for the service level agreement (SLA) rules of a task flow.

UpdateScenario.title: UpdateScenario
UpdateScenario.summary: Updates the name and description of the business scenario for a specified task flow.

UpdateStandardGroup.title: UpdateStandardGroup
UpdateStandardGroup.summary: Modifies the name and description of a specific security rule set.

UpdateTaskConfig.title: UpdateTaskConfig
UpdateTaskConfig.summary: Updates the advanced configuration of a task node.

UpdateTaskContent.title: UpdateTaskContent
UpdateTaskContent.summary: Updates tasks in a task flow.

UpdateTaskContentV2.title: UpdateTaskContentV2
UpdateTaskContentV2.summary: Updates the node content in large SQL files.

UpdateTaskFlowConstants.title: UpdateTaskFlowConstants
UpdateTaskFlowConstants.summary: Updates the constants for a specified task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowCooperators.title: UpdateTaskFlowCooperators
UpdateTaskFlowCooperators.summary: Updates the IDs of the users that are involved in a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowEdges.title: UpdateTaskFlowEdges
UpdateTaskFlowEdges.summary: Updates the start node and end node of multiple edges at a time for a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowNameAndDesc.title: UpdateTaskFlowNameAndDesc
UpdateTaskFlowNameAndDesc.summary: Updates the name and description of a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowNotification.title: UpdateTaskFlowNotification
UpdateTaskFlowNotification.summary: Updates the notification settings for a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowOwner.title: UpdateTaskFlowOwner
UpdateTaskFlowOwner.summary: Changes the owner of a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowRelations.title: UpdateTaskFlowRelations
UpdateTaskFlowRelations.summary: Fully updates the edges of a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowSchedule.title: UpdateTaskFlowSchedule
UpdateTaskFlowSchedule.summary: Updates the scheduling properties for a task flow.

UpdateTaskFlowTimeVariables.title: UpdateTaskFlowTimeVariables
UpdateTaskFlowTimeVariables.summary: Updates the time variables for a task flow.

UpdateTaskName.title: UpdateTaskName
UpdateTaskName.summary: Updates the name of a specified task.

UpdateTaskOutput.title: UpdateTaskOutput
UpdateTaskOutput.summary: Updates the output variables for a task node.

UpdateTaskTimeVariables.title: UpdateTaskTimeVariables
UpdateTaskTimeVariables.summary: Updates time variables for a task.
